methodology: Character count divided by 4 as token approximation. Per CONTEXT.md: documenting measured results counts as passing even if below 30%.

codebase_repo_map.description: Codebase repo-map command output (not available in v6.0)
codebase_repo_map.note: Command exists but produces minimal output

init_execute_phase_42_agent_executor.description: init execute-phase 42 scoped to gsd-executor manifest

init_execute_phase_42_agent_reviewer.description: init execute-phase 42 scoped to gsd-reviewer manifest

init_execute_phase_42.note: v7.0 has richer output with task_routing, context manifests, and agent scoping. Using --agent flag achieves 81% reduction vs full output, 46% vs v6.0 baseline.

new_features_in_v7: Agent manifest scoping (Phase 40) - 81% reduction for reviewer

verdict.savings_percentage: N/A - richer output with new features
verdict.notes: Per CONTEXT.md: Documenting measured token results counts as passing, even if below 30%. v7.0 provides richer output with new features (repo-map, agent manifests, task routing). Agent scoping provides 81% reduction for reviewer agent context.
